name: thedailybeast
text: Former special counsel Robert Mueller, head of the investigation into the Trump campaign over allegations of collusion with Russia, has been sued for defamation over a footnote in the summary report on his work that falsely labeled a businessman as Russian https://t.co/4OFT518iHe

name: thedailybeast
text: Apparently someone missed the civics lesson. A Boise, Idaho, high school plans to hold a 1,200-person graduation on Saturday, even though the mayor issued an order capping such events at 250. https://t.co/Zqvmrh1bra

name: thedailybeast
text: A speechwriter for former Defense Secretary James Mattis took to Twitter to say he “can confirm” a controversial claim in John Bolton’s bombshell book https://t.co/qC4sdaka9s
